alert.note: Alert for Adams; Pike; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ADAMS, PIKE AND NORTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Peebles, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Waverly, West Union, Piketon, Peebles, Pike Lake, Kincaid Springs, Blue Creek, Beaver, Rarden, Otway, Wakefield, Dunkinsville, Locust Grove, Givens, Mount Joy, Bear Creek, Cedar Mills, Lake White, Poplar Grove and Elm Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
